weapons.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + ~str~ piercing damage and the beast can use a bonus action to attempt to grapple the target.

weapons.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-dex-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + ~str-dex~ piercing damage and the beast can make another Claws attack as a bonus action.

weapons.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + ~str~ piercing damage.

weapons.name: Pummel
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + ~str~ bludgeoning damage and the beast can use a bonus action to attempt to shove the target.

weapons.name: Sting
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-dex-prof~ to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + ~str~ piercing damage and the beast can use a bonus action to attempt to grapple the target.

weapons.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + ~str~ bludgeoning damage and the beast can use a bonus action to attempt to shove the target.

weapons.name: Web (~prof~/Day)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +~str-prof~ to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC ~str-dex-dc~ Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

traits.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Keen Touch
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on its sense of touch.

traits.name: Echolocation
entries: The beast has blindsight out to 60 feet as long as it isn't deafened or silenced.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The beast can breathe water as well as air.

traits.name: Flyby
entries: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The beast can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.

traits.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the beast can long jump up to 25 feet.

traits.name: Slither
entries: The beast does not need limbs to walk, swim or climb.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The beast can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The beast's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The beast has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The beast can only breathe underwater. It has advantage on Stealth checks while underwater.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Keen Touch
entries: The beast has advantage on checks that rely on its sense of touch.

entries: The beast has blindsight out to 60 feet as long as it isn't deafened or silenced.

traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The beast can breathe water as well as air.

traits.name: Flyby
entries: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The beast can hold its breath for up to 1 hour.

traits.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the beast can long jump up to 25 feet.

traits.name: Slither
entries: The beast does not need limbs to walk, swim or climb.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The beast can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: The beast's long jump is up to 10 feet and its high jump is up to 5 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The beast has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The beast can only breathe underwater. It has advantage on Stealth checks while underwater.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The beast has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that has less than half its maximum hit points.

traits.name: Charge
entries: If The beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a natural weapon attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 bludgeoning damage, or an extra 2d6 piercing damage if the beast hit with a Gore attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC ~str-dc~ Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Crush
entries: If The beast succeeds on an Athletics check to grapple, it deals additional bludgeoning damage to the target equal to its Strength modifier.

traits.name: Dive (~prof~/Day)
entries: If The beast flies or swims at least 30 feet downward toward a target and then hits it with a natural weapon attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC ~str-dex-dc~ Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Envenom (~prof~/Day)
entries: If The beast succeeds on a Bite or Stinger attack, the target must make a DC ~str-dex-dc~ Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target is poisoned for 1 minute. An affected target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.  If the beast hit with a Stinger attack, the target also takes an additional 1d8 poison damage on a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The beast has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Pounce
entries: If the beast makes a long jump at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a natural weapon attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC ~str-dex-dc~ Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Relentless (1/Short Rest)
entries: If the beast takes damage less than 3 + ~level~ that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Second Wind (1/Short Rest)
entries: The beast can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d6 + ~level~.

traits.name: Toughen Up (1/Short Rest)
entries: The beast can use a bonus action to give itself advantage on Constitution saving throws against being poisoned or paralyzed for 1 minute, and gain ~half-level~ temporary hit points.
